content.rendered:
Mobile is taking all over the world, and there’re some facts to prove that:

  • Every day, more Android smartphones are activated than babies born
  • On average, every smartphone runs 41 application
  • People check their smartphone about 150 times a day

You can see the whole picture at New Relic infographics:

Via New Relic
